meta.title: Colorful Row – Victorian Houses in Urban Harmony by Eliran Bar-On
meta.description: An expressive urban scene of colorful Victorian-style houses by Eliran Bar-On, symbolizing individuality within community.

openGraph.og:title: Colorful Row – Victorian Houses in Urban Harmony by Eliran Bar-On
openGraph.og:description: Explore the charm of urban life with Eliran Bar-On’s painting of a vibrant row of Victorian-style houses, celebrating harmony in diversity.

structuredData.name: Colorful Row – Victorian Houses in Urban Harmony
structuredData.description: This painting features a vivid row of Victorian-style houses, each with unique colors and design, representing individuality within urban community.
